description: distro provides information about the OS distribution it runs on, such as a reliable machine-readable ID, or version information.
comment: This package is useful to detect on which specific distro your current python script is running. For example you might want to run the script both on your personal machine and on the server. In this case paths might change and you want to have an option to automatically change paths by detecting the OS
